author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43343.
Now that the HLT menu development is moved to 13_3_0, we can point the `relval2023` autoHLT key to use the `Fake2` menu (and change the 2023-based relval workflows to use the `FakeHLT`-based DQM sequences (as the HLT products won't be available for those anymore).
Concurrently a `relval2024` autoHLT key is created and used for the 2024-based relvals.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: move `relval2023` autoHLT key to `Fake2` and create `relval2024` autoHLT key (currently pointing to GRun)
